description: A great way to use up overripe bananas, this banana bread recipe is packed with oats, making it a hearty snack or breakfast option.
keywords: Bread,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Oaty Banana Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 110g Uncle Tobys traditional cooking oats (save 20g for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan forced. Grease and line a 23 x 12 cm loaf pan with baking paper.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, bi carbonate of soda, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir through UNCLE TOBYS’ Traditional Cooking Oats.
In a medium bowl, mash bananas with a potato masher or fork. Add oil, whole egg and egg whites; mix thoroughly

Pour batter into pan and top with extra UNCLE TOBYS’ Traditional Cooking Oats bake for 45 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from oven and allow to cool in pan for 5 minutes. Flip out and cool on a wire rack for another 10 minutes. Slice loaf into 10 equally sized slices.
